Fun videos

Orangeless ¶

A whimsical video about the bright orange California poppies in the Antelope Valley Poppy Reserve near Lancaster, CA. Filmed Apr 2010.

  • ► VIDEO

TechnoGlass ¶

I’m “playing” one of my favorite Cynic Project songs on this sliding glass door. I used the Adobe After Effects editor; each “key” is an adjustment layer with time-varying keyframes that automatically repeat with a period determined by the song’s tempo.

  • ► VIDEO

Magic toilet seat ¶

My sister Steph had her 20th birthday around the time I was learning Adobe After Effects. My brother and I whipped this up for her. I don’t think you can buy toilet seats that do this any more. The effects use adjustment layers that translate by tracking the hearts on the seat.

  • ► VIDEO

Nothing Bot Net ¶

Promotional video for Stanford’s mechatronics class (ME 210), featuring a robot-basketball competition. Filmed Spring 2007.

  • ► VIDEO

CoronaFreeze ¶

If you chill a beer in the freezer for half an hour, striking it causes ice crystals to nucleate on the bubbles that form.

  • ► VIDEO

Borescope Pumpkin ¶

Exploring the inside of a pumpkin with a borescope.
